description: This file defines the 'Orders Overview' screen for a manager within a Flutter app. It includes a widget displaying an overview with placeholders for order summaries, accessible based on permissions.

classes.name: ManagerOrdersOverviewScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the orders overview screen for a manager, with role-based access control.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A widget displaying the header section of the screen with a title and icon.

classes.name: _Note
classes.description: A widget representing a note or placeholder with an icon and descriptive text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the ManagerOrdersOverviewScreen, displaying content if authorized, otherwise an unauthorized placeholder.

methods.name: _Header.build
methods.description: Builds the header UI with a gradient background, icon, and title.

methods.name: _Note.build
methods.description: Builds a styled note container with an icon and text.
